caseTitle: Pakistan ELectronic Media Regulatory Authority (PEMRA) thr. its Chairman & another v. Pakistan Broadcasters Association, Karachi & others
authorJudge: Mr. Justice Syed Mansoor Ali Shah
tagline: The PEMRA (TV/Radio Broadcast Operations) Regulations, 2002 did not derive their power from the parent statute i.e. the PEMRA Ordinance, 2002 and therefore, were void ab initio and remained non est. There is no power to levy and recover surcharge on late payment of annual fee under the PEMRA Ordinance, 2002.
